text: Iwo amene amapewa machimo a akuluakulu ndi chigololo kupatula machimo a ang’onoang’ono, ndithudi, Ambuye wako ndi Mwini chikhululukiro. Iye amakudziwani bwino pamene amakulengani kuchokera ku dothi ndi pamene mukutidwa m’mimba mwa amayi anu. Motero musadziyeretse nokha. Al Najm	567 Iye amadziwa bwino kwambiri aliyense amene amalewa zoipa
